text: avaru tam'ma sarakannu teredaga adaralli tam'ma mottavannu tamage hindirugisalagiruvudannu kandaru. Avaru helidaru; nam'ma tandeye, navu innenannu tane apeksisaballevu? Namage maralisalagiruva nam'ma mottavu ido, illide. Navu nam'ma maneyavarigagi dhan'yavannu taruvevu. Nam'ma sahodararannu raksisuvevu mattu ondu onteya horeyastu heccinadannu taruvevu. Adu sulabhavagi siguva horeyagiruvudu
